name: Jarlslice
description:
Jarlslice was originally just a project to try out mesh slicing, which is one of the primary things you do in the game.

After working on the project for a while i decided to turn it into "jarlson 2", but i didnt't want to name it "jarlson 2".
So jarlson + slice = jarlslice... i know , how creative :P.I think the game is a big step up from jarlson , since it got so many new features and is just overall better.The two games don't really have too much simmilar , other than having the same core idea and having some modified karlson movement code.

I've updated the game quite a few times , adding a leveleditor and multiplayer. Both of them are a little limited,but work and are really fun to play.
